game.name: Donuts Bakery
game.description:
This cute and beautiful girl has recently inaugurated a donuts bakery at a fine location of the city. She looks pretty confused what to add or remove to design an excellent menu item. Ariel needs your help urgently and she relies on your skills a lot. Join Donuts Bakery and be prepared to cook some delicious donuts in the shortest time possible! Go through the ingredients shown on the screen and do not hesitate in challenging your cooking abilities to design your own delicious snacks!

Select a right kind of donut base and then add the multiple layers of sprinkles and icing in this brand new girls game! Make sure to decorate your donut with white or dark chocolate and put some round candy, a slice of orange, whipped cream or some cherries in the middle of the donut. It will be amazing if you serve this scrumptious donut with a nice drink like coffee, a slurry ice cream, an ice tea, a cherry juice, a soda or even popcorn.

Add another treat to your great menu like some croissants, a sandwich, a cheesecake or maybe a chocolate cake and see how your clients react towards your service in this HTML5 cooking game. Complete your game by serving the donut on a nice plate! You can also make an experiment by adding a slice of pie or a mini hamburger to prepare a yummy snack. You can also try out other popular new recipes in our free cooking games and have a wonderful virtual kitchen experience!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Donuts Bakery at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Cooking games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Donuts Bakery Game, Girls Games, Cooking Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
